Remain connected to the digital world without looking like you have a tiny tablet strapped to your wrist by opting for the Filippo Loreti luxury smart watch. It features the aesthetics of traditional timepieces while giving you access to music, photos, and notifications.

When completed in 2022, the Herons’s Tree construction project will be the largest and most spectacular hanging garden since Babylon. Located in France this massive interactive garden will offer an incredible birds-eye view of the surrounding Loire Valley.

Improve your posture and instantly relieve back pain by turning your backpack into an ergonomic model using these super strap backpack strain relievers. As soon as you give them a tug, they distribute the weight away from your neck and shoulders.

The Caswell Morphing Karambit utility knife’s ingenious design allows you to effortlessly whip out the two and a half inch ion bond/tungsten DLC finish steel blade without loosening your grip on the handle – just a simple flick of your thumb is all it takes!

Belle is the A.I. personal assistant door bell that’s like having a personal doorman 24/7. It comes loaded with useful features like two-way audio, facial recognition, night vision, and live streaming so you always know who’s at the front door.

Appeal to the naturalist in you while keeping the bathroom floor dry with the moss bathroom mat. This living bathroom mat contains actual moss on the surface that feeds itself through the drops of water that fall unto it, not to mention it feels great on your feet.

Give guests something to talk about when they visit by adding the Beautiful Chickens coffee table book to your collection. Italian photographers Moreno Monti and Matteo Tranchellini exquisitely capture the raw beauty of 62 of the most photogenic chickens you’ve ever seen.

titleEN: The World’s Most Comfortable Ear Plugs
content: Get the peace and quiet you crave without any discomfort by using the world’s most comfortable ear plugs. These reusable ultra soft ear plugs are made from an extremely flexible viscoelastic silicone that makes them 17 times softer than foam ear plugs.

Film incredible cinematic quality video directly from your smartphone with help from the Moment anamorphic camera lens case. The collection includes specialized gear like a battery photo case, a gimbal counterweight, an anamorphic lens and a filter mount.

Ensure you get the day started off on the right foot – even if you’re not a morning person – with the coffee brewing alarm clock. Every day you’ll awaken to the glorious aroma of roasted beans being freshly brewed into a piping hot cup of coffee to get your day going.

The Puna knife is the folding scalpel blade multi-tool disguised as a mini rifle that packs a series of useful tools designed to facilitate your everyday life. Apart from the razor sharp scalpel it boasts a series of tools ideal for cutting, twisting, prying, and unscrewing.

Scheme and backstab your way to the top as you try to accumulate the most gold in this Deadwood 1876 board game. You and your associates must work together to steal as many of the gold-filled safes floating around the lawless town in the Black Hills of South Dakota.

Keep your water clean and tasting great by pouring it inside this squeezable metal water bottle. Made from elastic titanium, it allows fast one-handed drinking with none of the disadvantages of plastic water bottles like potential health risks and bad tasting water.

Isn’t it time you upgraded your bedroom into the future? The Sobro smart side table features a sleek and modern design that boasts features like a motion sensing light, a thermoelectric cooling drawer, a wireless charging pad, and it can even track your sleeping patterns.

Move through the water as effortlessly as a fish by grabbing a hold of the AquaJet H2 aerodynamic sea scooter. This buoyancy adjustable device is remarkably easy to control and can dive down to depths of 60 feet while traveling at speeds of 9 kilometers an hour.

The most prominent unique feature of Achilles is the center opening, which is also important for the grip, but it serves a dual purpose. It helps to balance out the pressure while cutting or chopping by making room for your thumb or index finger.

This super versatile 3-in-1 memory foam travel pillow is the indispensable travel aid that will have you sleeping soundly no matter where you are. The design allows you to use it as a neck pillow, a standard flat pillow, or it can be rolled up around your arm to sleep on any desktop.

titleEN: The Milky Way In A Sphere
content: The Universe Sphere contains 200,000 stars laser etched into an 8cm glass orb – forming the Milky Way inside this beautiful desk ornament! There is no excuse for not having your very own galaxy that you can hold in your hands!

Add a geeky touch to your look without losing any style points using one of these dashing sword tie clips. The collection features ten high quality clips modeled after some of pop cultures most iconic swords and are available in either a silver, gold, or a combination finish.

Disconnect from the modern world without completely severing all ties by using the Light Phone 2. This sleek 4G LTE phone is equipped with only the essentials –
 calling, messaging, and an alarm clock – so that you can leave your smartphone at home more often.

titleEN: The Smart Flying Phone Case Camera
content: Record amazing aerial footage anytime and anywhere by encasing your phone in this smart flying phone case camera. This spiffy little gadget converts from a stylish phone case to a handy little camera drone that you can control using your smartphone.

Turn all your big ideas into real objects by outfitting your home shop with this autonomous robotic machine tool. Unlike standard and cumbersome CNC machines, this autonomous robot can work directly over your chosen material thanks to its multi-directional wheels.

The world’s best travel jacket is the extremely versatile garment you can’t afford not to bring on your next trip. It’s available in four styles that range from a vest to a bomber jacket and comes packed with 25 features including a neck pillow, passport pocket, and blanket.

Make your awesome wizard ensemble come to life with one of these magic wizard staffs. You can either choose the eye-catching chaos staff that produces 3,000 Btu’s of fireball casting fury or the fog staff that releases an eerie mist from the crystal ball located at the top.

If you’re a serious drinker, the duo all purpose cocktail glass is a must-have! This hand-blown glass comes with subtle 1 ounce indicators for easy measuring, a rounded interior designed for 2″ ice balls, and a double walled design that eliminates the need for coasters.

Slice through your favorite cuts of meat with surgeon-like precision by cutting it with the Skalpel steak knife. Crafted from a single piece of Sheffield stainless steel, each perfectly balanced knife is handmade by an expert knife maker with over 35 years of experience.

Enjoy a gourmet meal every night of the week with help from the Suvie multi-zone cooking kitchen robot. It turns 4 individual meal components – raw proteins, fresh vegetables, dry starches, and chef-designed sauces – into one perfectly cooked, restaurant quality meal.

A Wallet Series That Challenges Your Everyday Carry. Card, Bi-Fold & Travel Wallets with on-demand RFID security finished in top grain Carbon Fiber leather. Packed with NEW features like Magsnap closures, Q-Band Strap and Quick Eject Pull Tab.

Slash open envelopes with warrior like precision by arming yourself with one of these katana sword letter openers. Each pint sized miniature sword comes with an intricately designed traditional hilt along with a sharp and durable stainless steel blade.

Give your pearly whites a thorough cleaning with this eco-friendly battery-free powered toothbrush. It comes with a year supply of 100% biodegradable brushheads and features a simple mechanism where you simply twist the dial 2 times to power the brush for 2 minutes

Comfortably carry around a toolbox worth of tools in your wallet by making this credit card titanium multi-tool part of your everyday carry. This incredibly sturdy multi-tool comes packed with over 13 useful gadgets like 5 metric wrenches, a box cutter, and a USB holder.

The universal food container lid is the one lid to fit them all! UniLid is crafted from a durable environmentally friendly silicone that conforms to the shape of virtually any container – allowing you to turn nearly any container in your kitchen into instant storage.

Lexip is the high performance mouse designed just for gamers. Apart from providing all the functionalities of a regular mouse, it comes with two built-in joysticks – an internal one that’s controlled by tilting the mouse shell and a second one controlled by your thumb.

If you thought IMAX theaters were immersive, just wait until you watch a movie with this personal portable theater! This cylindrical theater comes with a dual driver speaker for high quality sound along with a handy Bluetooth remote control.

Make your next VR experience more immersive than ever with this virtual reality motion simulator chair. The compact, lightweight design allows for maximum portability and provides 360 degrees of movement on the vertical axis and 50 degrees on the horizontal.

Break down communication barriers on the road by communicating with your fellow drivers using this animated car communication device. This compact hands-free gadget allows you to use a wide variety of emojis to communicate with other drivers on the road.

PITTA is the transformative autonomous selfie drone that can go from an auto follow drone to a handheld action camera in no time at all. The modular design allows you to modify the drone so that it can either be flown, held, worn, or mounted.

Stay cool no matter where you are by beating the heat with this wearable cooling device and diffuser. Unlike typical fans, it draws air in through the main chamber, where it then passes over peppermint oil that acts as a cooling agent to cool you up 6 degrees in 2 minutes.

Revolutionize your bathroom going experience without spending a fortune by installing the smart toilet seat on your porcelain goddess. It comes loaded with extravagant features like a heated seat, a night light, heated water bidet, a massager, and a wireless remote.

Thaw rock hard pieces of meat in record time by placing them on top of this multifunctional defrosting tray. The frozen food rests on a cast-molded aluminum surface that literally pulls the heat out and reduces defrosting time from hours to minutes.

Ever wondered if someone spit in your food? This saliva scanner is a handheld device that analyzes biomedical composition – allowing you to detect enzymes that are only found in human saliva. It’s a must have for germaphobes and people who regularly insult waiters.

Remain connected without being consumed by your smartphone by switching to the world’s smallest phone. Inspired by the old Nokia phones, this tiny 47mm x 21mm x 12 mm takes up virtually no space and allows you to make calls and send text/receive text messages.

Throw out your floss and toothbrush and give your pearly whites the cleaning they deserve with the in-shower oral care system. While standard brushes only clean 60% of teeth surface, ToothShower provides a thorough cleaning that scrubs 100% of teeth surface.

Sleep cozier and more comfortable than ever before during long flights by cuddling up with the Mon Père travel pillow. The pillow is crafted from silicone to keep it firm yet bendable so that you can twist it and turn it to accommodate virtually any sleeping position.

Redefine the way that you relax outdoors by hopping inside this hanging canopy lounger. This lightweight lounger combines the portability of a hammock along with the luxury and comfort of a cabana so that you can relax in style while enjoying 360 degree vistas.

Enjoy your furry friend’s company without having to put up with the foul smell of their pee and poo by teaching them to go inside this automatic flushing litter box. It hooks up to your home’s sewage system so that your pet’s excrement can easily be flushed down.

Art and science join forces to brighten up your room with some cool accent lighting provided by this water manipulating fountain lamp. You’ll enjoy a moving stream of illuminated water that changes colors, rises upwards, and can split into multiple streams.

Enjoy drinking fresh, clean water anywhere by packing along the FIXT portable water filter. It utilizes both an activated coconut filter and iodinated resin which has a bacteria kill rate of 99.9999% to eliminate all harmful substances without removing healthy trace minerals.

Avoid becoming road kill while you’re riding at night by outfitting your bike with this 360 degree visibility bike reflector. Unlike standard reflectors, FLECTR 360 conveniently wraps around the rim so that it can be seen from any direction.

Equip yourself with the best possible utensils by adding these easy auto locking tongs to your kitchen set. These quality tongs are crafted from durable 316 stainless steel and feature an ergonomic design that allows you to lock and unlock the tongs with one hand.

Vessi are the world’s first 100% waterproof knit shoes. These fashionable and lightweight shoes are designed to fit, fit feel, and perform just like a regular shoe – expect they provide complete protection all the way up to your ankles – so your socks remain dry all day.

The world’s first 3D printed custom fit wrist watch. Every Alpha is anatomically matched to its owner. Using the latest in 3D scanning and 3D printing technology, its a platform that allows for quickly made anatomically matched watches.

Cruise around without worrying about annoying remote controls by hopping on this hands-free electric skateboard. It’s equipped with a custom gyroscope sensor and multiple weight and motions sensors that let you control the board using just your body movements.

When it comes to travelling, you won’t find a better bag than these Black Ember modular backpacks. These highly functional weatherproof bags can be used as backpacks or carried in a duffel bag fashion for added comfort.

Start living more sustainably by transforming your food waste into cooking gas using this renewable energy composting system. Simply toss your organic garbage into the opening and the bacteria inside take care of the rest as they break down the waste and create bio gas.

Don’t let the darkness slow down your progress – illuminate your work area with this flexible utility lighting strip. It features an ultra thin design that’s easy to transport, provides 3600 lumens, and comes with loops at each end so that you can conveniently hang it up.

Quit performing the plebeian task of cleaning up your shit stains by upgrading your porcelain goddess with the world’s first toilet cleaning robot. It is designed to give your toilet bowl and seat a thorough cleaning in just 90 seconds.

Explore our vast cosmos like never before by looking up at the night sky with the eVscope portable smart telescope. Using the accompanying app, simply select the celestial body you want to see, and this powerful telescope automatically moves into the right position.

GameShell is the world’s first modular, portable game console with a GNU/LINUX embedded operating system. This open source retro gaming console allows you to play thousands of classic games from consoles like NES, SNES, Game Boy, and Atari.

Revolutionize the way you clean your pearly whites by swapping your old brush for the Unico smart oral hygiene device. The ingenious design features an electric motor and a soft rubber belt that perfectly cleans your teeth in just 3 seconds flat.

Say goodbye to stinky water bottles once and for all by upgrading to the self-cleaning water bottle. It features a double insulated design that helps keep water cool and comes with a 280nm UV-C light that neutralizes up to 99.9999% of harmful and odor-causing germs.

Glide through unforgiving terrain with minimal effort by riding atop this all-terrain electric track board. This powerful board has a 12 mile range, can reach speeds of 20 mph, and comes with tank-like tracks designed to tackle tough terrain like dirt, snow, and sand.

Reduce fatigue, stress, and pain in one shot by sitting your tired butt on the zero-gravity upright posture cushion. This ergonomic cushion provides a weightless seating experience that reduces the stress placed on your spine and hips when you slouch.

Transform your phone into a handy flashlight by protecting it using these iPhone glow gel covers. The covers feature a slim profile to reduce bulk, are sturdy enough to protect against minor bumps and scratches, and can glow for over 12 hours after exposure to light.

Adventure tape is flexible, strong, and reusable – acting like Duct Tape on steroids. It is waterproof and creates an incredibly strong bond when adhered to itself without leaving behind a sticky residue so that you can use it to fix virtually anything you can imagine.

Stay nice and breezy – even on the hottest of days – by keeping this solar powered portable A/C close by. It weighs just 7 pounds, comes with a powerful micro air compressor that provides 150 square feet of cooling power, and lasts up to 8 hours on a single charge.

Help keep your belongings safe when you’re on-the-go by storing them inside this solar powered anti-theft backpack. In addition to the integrated lockable zippers, the pack features various hidden compartments in addition to a handy solar charger and speaker.

Ensure your valuables remain juiced up and safe from the elements by storing them inside this all-in-one solar battery charging power station/dry box. It features dual USB ports and a handy light that flashes when you receive calls on your smartphone.

Ditch the plastic and go green at your next outdoor event by eating off these disposable 100% leaf plates. They’re made from a middle paper leaf layer sandwiched between a bottom and top leaf layer, and are designed to completely decompose in just 28 days.

Remain comfortable without sacrificing style by slipping into a pair of these sneakers disguised as dress shoes. They provide all the confort and convenience of a regular sneaker with the sensibility of a dress shoe to ensure you’re always looking and feeling great.

Alleviate the stress and discomfort brought on by hours of typing by swapping out your outdated keyboard for this mechanical ergonomic keyboard. The keys on this stylish model are arranged in an ortho-linear fashion that conforms to your natural wrist angle for added comfort.

Brew your favorite craft beers with the touch of a button with the HOPii personal micro-brewery. Simply pour the ingredients into the chamber, select your favorite recipe, and watch as the smart auto-monitoring system whips up the most refreshing batch you’ve ever tasted.

Traverse the airport in record time using this motorized rideable luggage. It can reach speeds of up to 8 miles per hour and comes with a range of features like dual USB ports and quick stow pockets for added convenience.

Win the award for most overly obsessed pet owner by showing off your furry friend with this swimwear customized with your pet’s face. Simply snap a photo of your cute pet, upload it, and his/her beautiful mug will get plastered all over your towel or bathing suit.

Help your little one manage their fear of the dark with one of these vibrant force field cloaks for kids. Each 54″ x 40″ fleece blanket comes decorated with an eye-catching geometric design that comes alive in the dark after charging for 15 minutes under a bright light.

The Zippelin inflatable travel bag is designed to be spacious when you need it, and compact when you don’t. Hand-cut from recycled truck tarps, it can be easily inflated with a bike pump into a sizable duffel-styled suitcase – complete with removable wheels.

titleEN: The Wearable Thermostat For Your Body
content: Get thermal relief on demand by keeping your body temperature just right with the wearable thermostat for your body. Anytime you start to feel a little too cool or too hot, this handy device will employ conduction to get you feeling just right.

Transform your humble abode into a gaming mecca for you and your friends with the ultimate game table. This versatile modular and expandable table features rock solid construction and can be fully customized from exterior color and wood type to mountable accessories.

Explore a winter wonderland without being encumbered by bulky jackets using this smart heated thermal apparel. This lightweight, breathable, and water resistant clothing line comes with integrated torso pads and 3 heating levels that you control with the push of a button.

Stay connected and informed without having to worry about constantly recharging by slapping on LunaR – the world’s first solar powered smartwatch. It features a thin transparent solar panel on the face of the watch that can keep your watch going with just 1 hour of light exposure.

Pimax is the 8K VR headset that lets you experience the virtual world with peripheral vision while also eliminating motion sickness and the screen door effect. It provides an immersive 200 degree field of vision, and features less latency for a smoother experience.

Behold the future of luggage – the autonomous auto-following smart suitcase! It features a compact carry-on size, it can detect and intelligently move around obstacles, and it can travel at speeds of up to 4.5 mph while lasting for 12.5 hours when fully charged.

Maximize your chance of finding “love” in this shallow digital age by equipping your smartphone with Tinda Finger – the automatic Tinder swiping robot. Just plug it in and it will tirelessly swipe right on each new person – guaranteeing somebody will match you back.

Aire is the self-flying robotic home assistant capable of responding to voice commands and providing around the clock security for your home. It comes with multiple onboard cameras, advanced flight sensors, and features quiet concealed propellers ideal for indoor flight.

Ensure your little aquatic eco-system remains squeaky clean 24/7 by placing the MOAI robotic aquarium cleaner on the job. Apart from its cleaning capabilities, this WiFi enabled robot comes with an onboard camera that lets you stream live footage straight to your phone.

Perfect your short game and aim on the golf course by playing this golf cornhole lawn game. This fun hybrid comes with a small putting mat and a large cornhole board that can be propped up instantly using nothing more than a couple of beer bottles.

Capture precious life moments without having to resort to digital tech by snapping them with the Lomo’Instant square camera. This fully analog instant camera uses Fujifilm’s Instax Square film and features a 95 mm glass lens along with a zone focusing system for clear shots.

Give a classy and creative spin to time telling by strapping on this wooden word watch. This unique timepiece features a lovely walnut case that can display the time of day in either a digital layout or short word layout simply by pressing the side button.

titleEN: Radius Case For The iPhone X
content: The gold plated iPhone X RADIUS is anything but your conventional iPhone case. This stunning finish is achieved via a labor Intensive process of hand-polishing each individual part of the case, then dipped and plated in gold.

The Crua One modular tent system is the versatile shelter that adapts to fit your lifestyle. The tent is made up of several structures that can be used separately or pieced together depending on what type of trip your are going to take.

The classic cotton swab is an archaic and sometimes even a dangerous tool. Instead of push cleaning like regular Q-tips, these reusable medical grade silicone ear cleaners employ a rotary cleaning motion that won’t harm your eardrums.

This wireless smart head up display gives you access to your smartphone’s most important features without diverting your eyes from the road. It connects wirelessly to your smartphone so that you can receive calls, texts, control music selection, and utilize the GPS.

The Luna iPad wireless second display device instantly turns any iPad into a handy second display that will improve your workflow. Available for Mini DisplayPort or USB-C, it works with your existing Wi-Fi connection to seamlessly extend your Mac’s desktop to your iPad.

Experience first hand what it’s like to be a NASA scientist remotely driving on Mars with the Turtle Rover modular R/C vehicle. It features a waterproof design, an onboard HD camera, and even comes with a small mechanized arm that you can control.

The Wolverine self healing utility bag earns its name from the lightweight yet resilient FuseFabric that can repair itself in the event of small cuts or punctures. If the bag’s surface is ever punctured, the heat and friction caused by rubbing your bare hands will repair the fabric.

Get your foot inside the world of robotics by programming the Hexa intelligent spider robot. It can be wirelessly controlled using your PC or smartphone, features a range of sensors for maximum control, and a 6 legged design for a high degree of maneuverability.

Add an entire new level of difficulty and realism to a classic game by playing a few rounds of Battleship floating beer pong. Simply fill up the cups with the beverage of your choice and start bombarding your enemy for a day of fun and inebriation.

Wave goodbye to water rings for good by serving your beverage inside the floating mug. This eye-catching elegant mug features an entirely transparent glass design that connects the mug to a handy coaster through the handle to prevent water rings from forming.

Keeping your canned beverages icy cold while you’re on-the-go is simpler than ever with this high performance ice pack. It features an ergonomic concave design that cradles the cans while they’re held together in place by a sturdy rubber band.

Bring one of the most iconic sci-fi robots into your living room by listening to your audio through the Terminator multimedia speaker. This fearsome T-800 features Bluetooth capabilities, comes with an onboard HD cam, a built-in mic, and integrates with Amazon’s Alexa.

Ensure you always hit your mark during those nighttime bathroom trips with help from the projector toilet night light. It discreetly sticks onto the toilet lid and projects a series of images onto the toilet bowl below so that you can see without having to turn on the lights.

No matter where your allegiances lie, the universal gaming controller is the one device to rule them all. With the ability to switch between 11 USB drivers and 7 Bluetooth drivers, this versatile controller can be connected to any computer, console, phone, or tablet.

titleEN: High Heels That Feel Like Sneakers
content: Good news ladies! Thanks to these high heels that feel like sneakers you’ll be able to stay fashionable without torturing your poor feet day after day. Each pair is tailored to your precise measurements and features a cushioned interior to provide extra support and comfort.

The ultimate universal charging cable is the last charging cable you’ll ever need. This 4 foot cable features a tangle-free steel casing and a magnetized Neodymium tip that lets you switch between USB-C, Android, and Apple compatible ports.

Experience a nostalgia overload by playing your favorite video games on the Dreamcade Replay retro console. It comes with emulators that let you play thousands of games from dozens of different platforms, play games from STEAM, and stream media.

Staying in shape while you’re out-of-town is remarkably simple with the foldable travel-friendly pull-up bar. This versatile piece features a lightweight yet sturdy design that lets you perform all kinds of body weight exercises and folds down to a compact size for easy carry.

This smart powerbank wallet can do a lot more than simply charge your phone. Apart from the built-in power bank, this high-tech wallet comes with global GPS tracking, a distance alarm that notifies you if you leave your wallet behind, and a thief detection camera.

Taking professional quality photographs on location is simpler than ever with the folding all-in-one portable photo studio. This 25 x 25 inch studio is equipped with an LED lighting system, easy backdrop setup, and folds flat for easy transport.

Save time by answering calls instantly without having to take out your phone by wearing this voice powered smart ring. This handy device uses bone conduction technology to allow you to take your calls simply by placing your finger to your ear.

The Kodoma Obsidian affordable 3D printer aims to make 3D printing easy and accessible to everyone. Unlike traditional models that are bulky and expensive, the Obsidian printer fits on any desktop and comes with a build area measuring 4.7 inches on all sides.

Give your blocky creations some nighttime appeal by constructing them using these wireless light up LEGO bricks. These small bricks are compatible with all your existing LEGO bricks and come with small built-in LEDs that work up to 8″ away from the base.

titleEN: Motion Sensing Night Light Soap Dispenser
content: Avoid straining your eyes with a bright bathroom light when nature calls in the middle of the night by placing this motion activated night light soap dispenser by your sink. It gives off a cool glow that that you can customize to one of eight vivid hues.

The kevlar smart micro adjustment belt is the indestructible belt designed for durability and unmatched comfort. Made from leather and kevlar, this stylish piece  comes with an automatic buckle and special track system with 5mm increments to achieve the perfect fit.

Avoid wasting money on replacement cables by easily repairing stripped cables yourself using this liquid plastic welder. It utilizes a proprietary liquid gel that hardens instantly when it is exposed to the UV flashlight that is mounted onto the gun.

Instantly set a cool environment ideal for partying by turning on these Kalium superhero Bluetooth speakers. Wherever there’s a dull environment, these little heroes swoop in to provide crisp sound, ambient lighting, and smoke machine effects.

Accessorize your outfit in true Marty McFly fashion by slipping into the world’s first smart shoe. These high tech kicks feature, shock absorbers, heating, and an innovative auto-tightening system that eliminates the need for laces.

The puffy poncho is quite possibly the best garment ever made for the outdoors. Apart from being waterproof, it’s lightweight, comes with a special pocket ideal for holding your drink, it’s machine washable, and is infinitely more stylish than regular plastic ponchos.

Feel like a professional chef next time you’re making dinner by slicing and dicing with the Kuroi Hana Japanese knife collection. They’re crafted from Japanese AUS-10 steel for unrivaled sharpness and are hand-etched to form a dark floral pattern on the blade.

Add whole new dimension of realism to your D&D game nights by constructing your very own dungeon with  Dwarven Forge’s modular D&D game terrain pieces. This beautifully handcrafted set features intricate detailing and multiple levels of elevation.

The world’s first graphene headphones deliver a groundbreaking audio experience. ORA’s patented GrapheneQ membranes use nanotechnology to provide better localization cues in order to produce a wider, more realistic listening experience.

Connect with nature and your friends like never before during your next camping trip by sleeping inside the RhinoWorld modular attachable super tent. It comes with a built-in mattress, a sleeping bag, and can easily hook up to other units in order to create a mega tent.

Take the hard work out of keeping your garden weed-free by placing this solar powered weeding robot on the job. This Roomba-like waterproof robot constantly monitors and maintains your garden – chopping down unsightly weeds before they have a chance to grow.

Hydrating on the go is easier than ever when you strap on the wearable hydration sleeve. This lightweight and breathable sleeve conceals a 12 ounce capacity bladder with a replaceable mouthpiece and a functional roll-top closure system for easy refills.

Keep any work or living space tidier than ever by placing your stuff inside this minimalist modular organizer. This beautifully designed organizer allows you to customize the layout so that you can accommodate anything from a notepad to your phone.

Create amazing sculptures and pottery with little to no skill using this desktop 3D clay printer. You simply load the clay, download the model or design you want to craft, click a few buttons, and sit back as the sculpture comes to life right before your very eyes.

Transform any sunny location into the ideal place for an alfresco meal by using this solar powered stove. The design and efficient reflectors focus sun light directly onto your pan or pot so that you can boil, grill,  fry, and simmer your food to perfection.

This DIY pinball machine stands out above all the rest for its quick assembly and customization options. It sets up in just 30 to 60 minutes and can be fully customized with any decorations, obstacles, and color scheme you choose.

Relieve anxiety in style by keeping your hands busy with this infinity cube fidget toy. Each anodized aluminum cube is linked together so that you can easily unfold it over and over and keep your mind busy while you focus on your task at hand.

Revolutionize the way you drink wine by sipping your favorite spirits from one of these sediment capturing wine glasses. These handmade glasses feature a small spiral shaped deposit at the base that traps sediment to eliminate the bitter grit.

Keep your smartphone from dying out on you in the middle of the day by juicing it up with this wireless charging wallet. This handy wallet comes with a 4000 mAh Li-ion battery that wirelessly charges your phone when you place it on top of the wallet.

Control your favorite DSLR or mirrorless camera entirely from your smartphone using the Arsenal intelligent camera assistant. This ultralight piece of hardware mounts on top of your camera so that you can conveniently control it with the app.

Experience the wonder of augmented reality for a fraction of the price with Aryzon’s 3D smartphone augmented realty. Similar to the Google Cardboard, this incredible system will allow you to project 3D objects into the world with help from your smartphone.

titleEN: All In One Smart Credit Card
content: Lighten your load by decluttering your wallet with help from Fuze – the all in one smart credit card. This lightweight electronic card can be used just like a regular credit card, but it is designed to digitally store up to 30 different credit, debit, and gift cards.

Instantly save any paper document to your computer or tablet using this pocket smart scanner. This portable device works just like a camera – simply hold the scanner above the image or document, press the “initiate” button and it will instantly scan.

Save hours in the kitchen by preparing two dishes at once using this universal baking sheet divider. This adjustable divider withstands temperatures up to 500  degrees Fahrenheit and features small embedded magnets that keep the divider in place while cooking.

The electric longboard of the future has finally arrived. XTND is the smart longboard with A.I. that boasts features like regenerative braking, wireless charging, step recognition, and machine learning that analyzes and adapts to your riding style the more you use it.

Get a fish’s perspective of the ocean by dropping in this bionic wireless underwater fish drone. This fish shaped drone comes with a 4K camera along with features like automated balance and obstacle avoidance to minimize underwater collisions.

Create a fully immersive experience when watching your favorite flicks by installing this responsive TV LED backlighting kit. It enhances your viewing experience by projecting a dynamic glow of light on every side of your screen to create a theater-like effect.

Avoid polluting waterways with fleece and microfiber by dropping this microfiber catching laundry ball in with your load. The ball swooshes around in the laundry, allowing water to flow through while collecting and trapping small pieces of microfiber.

Turn almost any vertical surface into a mobile office using the window mounted standing desk. It employs a vacuum lever design that works on all types of walls and windows – and is strong enough to handle over a forty pound load.

Get rid of language barriers once and for all when travelling abroad by wearing this language translator smart ring. This versatile ring can easily translate up to 24 languages including French, Spanish, and German – and requires no WiFi access to work.

The world’s smallest universal travel adapter combines all the functionality of a big bulky adapter into a gadget smaller than a single socket adapter. It features a simple design that’s easy to use and works in over 150 different countries.

Kick your old classroom antics up a notch by bombarding your mark with this spitball blaster gun. These brightly colored weapons let you fire up to 16 biodegradable tissue paper shells per magazine and hit targets up to 65 feet away.

Save bundles by drastically reducing your electricity bill when you install these solar panel window blinds. These photovoltaic blinds can generate up to 150 watts of renewable energy per 10 square feet of your window – enough to power 3 MacBooks.
