Plastic 3D printers lose their charm very quickly – they are fragile, prone to clogging, and have limitations on how fast they can print. Now with the Trinus you can get yourself an all-metal 3D printer without breaking the bank.

Get one step closer to becoming a real life Iron Man with one of these Badjo exoskeleton suits. In addition to standard components like full temperature control, you can customize the suit with everything from Spiderman-like webbing to flame throwers.

Conquer any terrain mother nature throws your way by riding on this convertible all-road bike. The intelligent design allows you to alter the bike’s geometry in order to better suit the type of ride you have planned and get the ultimate performance.

Now you can automatically adjust your blinds based on sunlight, temperature, or a preset schedule using this solar powered blind adjuster. It installs in three easy steps and is designed to work on both horizontal and vertical blinds.

Minimize your chances of getting a ticket while driving by outfitting your ride with this legal wireless speed trap indicator. It fits discreetly on your dashboard and warns you of impending speed traps, red light cameras, and school zones by flashing in different hues.

Explore the world of genetics by performing your own DNA tests using this portable laboratory. A centrifuge extracts the DNA while a thermocycler targets a specific piece of it and then makes millions of copies that are visualized by an illuminated gel unit.

Improve your auditory experience by listening to your tunes through these 3D audio headphones. The headphones instantly calibrate to your anatomy, increasing the sense of auditory space, and acoustically recreating the way you hear the world.

Getting clean on the go has never been easier than with these big baby wipes for adults. These eco-friendly pads are made from all natural spunlace cotton that’s extremely soft to the touch and measure an impressive 12″ x 24″.

Make the most out of your limited closet space by hanging your garments on these space saving clothing hangers. The innovative design eliminates the empty space in between the rod and your clothes so they hang higher – providing more space below.

Bring your designs to life with electronic sensors, motors and connected apps. These LEGO-like building blocks are designed to safely conduct electricity and can sync with your smartphone so you can control the structure remotely.

Cubetto is the hands-on coding toy designed to introduce kids to the world of programming from an early age. It uses a set of colorful coding blocks and instructions, allowing your kids to create actual programs that move the little Cubetto around.

Bring living-room-style comfort to the great outdoors with this ultimate inflatable air lounger. This ultra lightweight and portable piece of furniture inflates in mere seconds, floats, and can be used over a variety of rugged terrains without risk of popping.

Give your game nights some added flair and durability by incorporating some of these bulletproof glass dice. They are available in a wide range of vibrantly colored polyhedral dice with your choose of anything from D4 to D100.

Add a touch of sophistication to your drinks by making some crystal clear cubes of ice using this specialized tray. The innovative design of the tray mimics the natural freezing process to quickly and easily create aesthetically pleasing crystal clear cubes.

The smart parka is the last winter coat you’ll ever need to own. Available in both men’s and women’s sizes, this water resistant parka is designed with features like built-in gloves, a hat pocket, and a removable lining so you can adjust it according to the weather conditions.

Now you can transform your smartphone into a 3D printer – yes, you read that right! This compact, inexpensive, and revolutionary device utilizes daylight resins in conjunction with light from your smartphone’s screen to print 3D objects.

The hottest thing to hit planet earth since that meteor that killed all those dinosaurs long ago – these free-range dinosaur eggs take just 6 million years to hatch – though if you can’t wait, you’ll be greeted by a cuddly dead baby dinosaur inside. Your call.

Revolutionize the way you enjoy your meals and treats by using edible cutlery. Designed to replace wasteful plastic utensil usage, this vegan friendly cutlery is designed so it’s easy to grab and comes in three varieties including rice, wheat, and sorghum.

Now you can always get an even cook over an open flame by placing your food on this always flat campfire cooking stick. This hinged campfire cooker’s design holds your impaled food flat over the fire to ensure the heat is always distributed evenly.

Eliminate annoying cable clutter once and for all by juicing up your devices with this tangle free data/charging cable. The compact design lays flat like a card and can easily be stretched to accommodate any device.

Simplify the way you prepare everyday meals by cooking them using this multi-function smart oven. It’s designed to switch seamlessly between steaming, baking, broiling, and convection heating to get the best possible flavor and texture from chef-curated meals.

No one likes playing with dirty balls – these beer pong nets create a physical barrier so that if a shooter misses, the ball conveniently slides down the net and onto the table. The net is designed to easily attach to a variety of tables and is machine washable..

Learning to play an instrument has never been easier or more convenient thanks to these online piano lessons. Instead of spending a bundle on a tutor, you’ll learn how to tickle the ivories just like the pros at a fraction of the price.

Cook rustic outdoor meals just as easily as if you were indoors using this mighty field skillet. Modeled after vintage American skillets, this lightweight cast iron pan can handle anything from meats to flaky pie crusts, and only gets better with time and use.

Learn the ins and out of the multi-billion dollar fashion industry by reading the ultimate fashion bible. Fashionpedia acts as a visual dictionary that guides you through every facet of the industry – from technical terms to its fascinating history.

Instantly illuminate your surroundings with one of these tiny flashlights in a matchbook. Available in three vibrant colors, each miniature flashlight is completely waterproof and built with a magnetic base so you can stick them almost anywhere.

Harness the power of the sun to warm yourself up 20 degrees in just 2 minutes with this solar powered thermal jacket. Available in men’s and women’s sizes, these thermal jackets are waterproof and breathable so you can stay warm without needing a bulky jacket.

These carbon fiber sunglasses provide superb protection from sunlight without sacrificing style. The glasses sport a durable carbon fiber frame and feature a seven layer scratch resistant lens available in either black, blue, or golden shades.

Get the younger generation interested in politics by making them feel the Bern with this Bernie Sanders action figure. Ol’ Bernie comes dressed in an elegant black suit and sports his trademark white hair and bespectacled look.

The world is a disgusting cesspool of disease and filth. As a rational human being, you can finally protect yourself from whatever life threatening diseases may lurk underneath public door handles by using this door handle opener.

Make ice cubes in a fraction of the time by using this flash freezing tray. Each triangular tray features a special internal cooling fluid designed to store up coldness from the freezer and rapidly release it back into the tray so its contents cool in just 10 minutes.

Charge all your devices using just one cable! The Android & iOS common connector cable breaks down the barrier between lightning and micro USB ports so that you can charge anything from an iPhone to a Galaxy with ease.

Reuse and recycle all kinds of plastic bottles with this plastic bottle cutter. The cutter allows you to get more use out of discarded plastic bottles by slicing them into brightly colored plastic ropes that you can use for a variety of craft projects.

The smart modular power strip’s functional design allows you to customize its layout to fit your particular charging needs. You’ll be able to mix and match the various modules and then wirelessly control the devices that are plugged in using your smartphone.

Make the most of your kitchen’s limited counter space with help from this pot lid holder. This ingenious device attaches to the pot and provides a secure space to rest lids, spoons, ladles, and other kitchen utensils when they’re not in use.

Improve your working environment when on the go by using this laptop bag that doubles as a stand. It features an elegant water-resistant exterior and can be folded back to create a stable and elevated stand for your laptop.

Keep your coffee/tea at the ideal temperature by serving it inside of the stone cup. Crafted from metamorphic rock, the cup can either be cooled or heated prior to serving, so you can experience your drink’s natural flavor.

The Ellum solar is an intuitive smart light, embedded with sensors that illuminate the dark when motion is detected. It attaches magnetically, has a touch dimmer to manually adjust the brightness, and provides six months of use on just a single day of charging.

Microscape’s models are detailed 1:5000 scale replicas of iconic urban environments, like the Empire State building, and the United Nations HQ. They are 3D printed using aerial scan data that displays cityscapes in its most up to date layout.

Simplify your parenting duties when you’re out and about with your little one by placing her in this self driving smart stroller. This rolling nursery comes with an electric motor that propels the stroller automatically and features a built-in bottle warmer and rocker.

Party like a true patriot by trading in your freedom hating imported spirits for some good old fashioned ‘Murica Moonshine. Each bottle of white lightning is distilled in the good ‘ol U.S. of A. for unmatched flavor and potency.

Light up any dark path while still keeping your hands free by using this flexible light strap. This waterproof tool comes outfitted with 5 ultra bright LEDs that provide up to 800 lumens of output attached to a flexible belt that can be affixed virtually anywhere.

See if you’ve got what it takes to make it through the zombie apocalypse by playing a round of the Walking Dead miniatures game. Based on the iconic comic series, you’ll get to play as your favorite characters while going up against walkers and other groups.

Improve your daily commute by getting from point A to point B effortlessly using the world’s lightest electric scooter. Weighing just under 9 pounds, this ultra portable scooter features a powerful and durable battery capable of reaching speeds up to 12.5 mph.

Keep your unused luggage out of sight without sacrificing storage space using this smart collapsible hard suitcase. Its unique design allows you to flatten the entire suitcase down to just 3 inches in width, so you can easily hang it on a closet rack.

Astound onlookers by defying gravity in your home with this levitating air plant. Using magnetic levitation to create the eye-catching effect, this small green plant cube quietly hovers and rotates over the wooden base as your plant peacefully grows.

This re-engineered travel pillow will ensure you get a good night’s sleep even in the most uncomfortable of seats. It fits snugly under your head and holds it in place so you’ll never bob around from side to side as you doze off.

Increase the functionality of your home’s outlets by outfitting your walls with these pop out outlet multipliers. With the simple push of a button, the number of disposable outlets doubles so you can accommodate all your electronic devices.

Class up your game room setup by swapping out your old dice for these cast metal gaming dice. Available in a variety of shapes that range from D4 to D20, they’re made by hand and are offered in various finishes like aluminum and yellow brass.

Keep your phone fully juiced while you relax with a refreshing drink by using this phone charging drink coaster. This elegant bamboo coaster is the perfect way to charge your device when there’s no traditional outlets available – such as a crowded coffee shop.

This one of a kind world metro map gives you a first hand look at what our planet would look like if it was interconnected by one massive and borderless metro. Nearly every single station in the world is represented – totaling 214 cities, 791 lines, and 11,924 stations.

Get a flame going even in damp or windy conditions by using this survival fire starter pen. This battery operated tool features a copper tip designed to immediately create a spark when placed next to steel wool and is compact enough to carry anywhere.

Fully immerse yourself in your favorite videogame like never before by wearing this full body haptic suit. This futuristic styled suit features a state of the art electro-tactile haptic feedback system that lets you touch and feel your virtual surroundings.

Enjoy a comfy nap anytime and anywhere by wearing this inflatable sleep hoodie. Apart from the slim-fit and fashionable color options, the hoodie can be inflated into a soft and ergonomic pillow so you can comfortably rest while on the go.

Improve visibility in any situation by whipping out this bullet LED flashlight. Despite its compact bullet sized frame that makes it remarkably convenient to carry, it emits a powerful white light from the tip that you can activate with a simple twist.

Spice up your boring diet with a little flavor using this all in one seasoning system. No matter what type of food you’re preparing, these vegan-friendly spices go great on anything, are made from all natural ingredients, and are available in four flavorful seasoning styles.

Change the look of your ride with the swipe of a finger using this app controlled automotive lighting system. After installation, these waterproof and Bluetooth enabled lighting strips can be customized with thousands of color combinations using the app.

Stay on top of your busy and ever-changing schedule by writing down all your appointments in this reusable whiteboard planner. It features weekly, monthly, yearly, and goal-setting pages that are coated in a dry-erasable surface that is rewritable.

Ensure you have enough space to plug in all your devices while you travel by bringing along this revolutionary portable power strip. Smaller than an actual doughnut, this power strip manages to fit five outlets and two USB ports into its sleek design.

Set up the perfect storage system anywhere in your home using this modular hexagon shelving system. Available in either a 6″ or 12″ model, the shelves can easily be stacked on top of each other or placed side by side to create a honeycomb-like structure.

Eliminate the need for lugging around heavy rails when you want to capture a moving time lapse by using this specially designed camera trolley. Instead of setting up a complex rig, simply string a cord between two posts and your camera will function as a trolley.

Discover the amazing microcosm that surrounds us at all times using this credit card sized professional microscope. This sleek gadget utilizes your phone’s zoom capabilities to provide up to 320x magnification while transmitting everything to the phone’s screen.

Have everything you need to cook close at hand by preparing your meals on the ultimate cutting board. This Swiss Army knife of cutting boards features everything from knife storage and a removable juicer to a cheese grater and measuring cups.

Stay nice and dry next time you get caught in the rain by wearing this waterproof and breathable hoodie. It features a clear water repellent coating over the entire surface in addition to a range of concealed pockets so you can easily carry around all your gear.

Place a new spin on game night by conducting it in the dark and playing with these black light cards. This one of a kind deck features a psychedelic theme that comes alive once the lights go off and the black light is turned on.

Experience the real sense of shooting a gun and feeling the recoil while playing an FPS game using the Rail Gun controller attachment. It can be equipped onto an air soft gun and is designed so you can turn 180 or 360 degrees in game.

Help Mother Earth by cleaning her waters with this ocean trash collecting machine. After placing it into the water, this automated machine begins sucking up filthy water – without harming marine life – collecting trash and harmful oils inside of it.

Stave off boredom without gluing yourself to the TV by playing with this magnetic game system instead. The system is composed of dozens of different colored and shaped magnetic pieces you can connect together or bounce off each other.

With this detachable blade multi-tool you’ll be able to keep an array of useful tools on you without creating a cumbersome bulk. The ultra sleek design is thin enough to fit in your wallet yet features five practical tools like a screwdriver, knife, and mini pry bar.

Get today’s forecast right in your living room using this ambient weather display device. It syncs to your smartphone to get the latest weather data and displays it in a visual way inside the clear rectangle – producing everything from clouds and snow to rain and lightning.

Increase your chances of survival when you’re in the wild by bringing along this 12-in-1 tactical utility pendant. Though small in size, every inch of this pendant acts as a useful tool like a knife, hammer punch, arrowhead, and multi-wrench.

Thieves. Rain. Potholes. The city-proof bicycle will conquer them all. This one of a kind ride comes equipped with a rust-stopping chain, waterproof saddle, and puncture resistant tires in addition to a 24-hour replacement guarantee if it’s ever stolen.

Bring all the fun of an arcade into your home without taking up too much space using the modern retro arcade cabinet. It sports a sleek minimalist design that attaches to the wall, lets you play all your favorite games, and lets you play either single or multiplayer.

Keep a useful array of tools on you at all times without the bulk by carrying around this survival credit card holder. Apart from firmly securing your precious plastic, the super slim and sturdy frame stores over seven everyday tools like a compass and screw driver.

Ensure you’re equipped to handle any situation you encounter in the wild by having this outdoor survival multi-tool shovel at your side. It features a solid carbon fiber steel construction and includes eight useful tools such as a hammer, a pickaxe, and even a saw.

Instantly turn any helmet into a smart helmet using this revolutionary kit. The most advanced helmet mounted accessory ever built, it comes in a sturdy waterproof housing and is equipped with everything from an accelerometer, a HD camera, Wi-Fi, and a GPS.

Avoid being stuck with a damaged phone just because you had one little fall by outfitting your device with this iPhone screen glass protector. It comes reinforced with a nanomaterial coating that makes the screen durable against drops and heavy impacts.

The flying personal robot is the revolutionary new drone designed to prevent injury and improve your flying experience. It comes with an on-board computer, mounted HD camera and features a design that conceals the rotor blades with a protective grid.

The Ultimate NES Library Guide is a mammoth 450 page book that comes filled with every little detail of over 750 NES games – such as their release date, developer, genre, availability, as well as a full review and rating for each title.

Conserve heat and lower your electric bill throughout the cold winter months by setting up this room in a room. The small tent fits directly over your existing bed, can be fitted with a light, and features a mesh top designed to ventilate the air.

This simplified smartphone attachment is a clever product aimed at facilitating smartphone usage for the elderly and disabled. Instead of a complex touchscreen, interaction is accomplished via a large full tactile keyboard and front display.

Bring the majesty of the ocean to your room using this jellyfish cylinder aquarium. The graceful movements of the tiny jellyfish help create a soothing environment while the built in LEDs create cool accent lighting for your room.

Give your favorite board game some added edge by swapping out the classic dice for this metal LED version. Crafted from a solid block of aluminum, this sleek and modern dice features internal LEDs designed to give each side a different colored glow.

Listen to your favorite tunes with unparalleled comfort using these quick custom fitting wireless headphones. These revolutionary Bluetooth earphones feature tips that mold to the unique shape of your ears in just 60 seconds!

Ensure your phone stays powered up all day long with help from the world’s most compact solar charger. The ingenious and functional design lets you roll up a thin solar panel into a tiny cylinder – allowing you to have some serious energy generation without the bulk.

Experience the closest shave of your life by swapping your disposable out for the world’s sharpest razor. Previously priced at a whopping one hundred thousand dollars, the sapphire blade’s unique properties makes it ten times sharper than a surgeon’s scalpel!

Avoid breathing in the harmful toxins floating through the environment by measuring the air quality using this portable air pollution monitor. It’s designed to detect a wide range of harmful substances like carbon monoxide and other volatile substances in real time.

Keep discomfort levels at a minimum next time you surf the crimson wave by wearing these period-proof undies. These unique dual-layer undies feature bamboo microfiber, cotton, and a liquid blocker so you stay dry – eliminating the need for pads or tampons.

Enjoy a worry free day out on the water with the world’s first floating smartphone. This Android powered phone boasts a powerful processor, sleek design, and is completely buoyant so you never again have to worry about losing your phone in a deep body of water.

Reenact your favorite Star Wars fight scenes without fear of injuring your opponent using these foam lightsabers. They get their glow from embedded color changing LEDs and are fully encased in high quality foam making them ideal for actual sword fights.

Extend your phone’s life expectancy by avoiding accidental drops using this ring loop iPhone case. In addition to shielding its surface from minor bumps and scratches, the ring loop case ensures your phone remains firmly attached to your hand.

Ensure you’re never left stranded when trekking through the wild using this life saving portable solar battery. It comes with indicator lights so you know how much juice you have left and features four USB ports and a small S.O.S. emergency flashlight.

Easily transform any shoe into a comfy slip-on using the knot free shoelace system. Made from a high grade fiber reinforced resin, the simple design is easy enough for a child to use, yet tough enough for a triathlete to compete in.

Remain dry and comfortable throughout the day no matter what you’re up to by wearing these no sweat pants. Apart from looking stylish, they’re made using a revolutionary fabric infused with performance fibers that are odor resistant and moisture absorbing.

Keep your kitchen filled with fresh ingredients year round by supplying it with vegetables produced by this autonomous indoor garden. It automatically provides your plants with the lighting, nutrients, and irrigation necessary for them to flourish.

See what the unfinished Death Star II would have looked like completed by taking a gander at this Death Star blueprints poster. Designed by graphic artist Carlos Pardo, this stunning collectible gives you an in depth view of the colossal weaponized space station.

Increase the production value of your home movies by outfitting your iPhone with this vintage film camera case. The case helps stabilize your shots and can be outfitted with different lenses such as super wide and fish eye.

titleEN: Licensed Lord Of The Rings Coins
content: Become the coolest kid in the Shire by adding these licensed Lord Of The Rings coins to your currency collection. This coveted set of coins accurately depicts the currency used by Elves, Dwarves, and other beings throughout Tolkien’s Middle-earth.

Don’t panic when you’re stranded in the wild – because you’ve got the multi-tool survival knife! Forged from a single piece of stainless steel, the uniquely styled handle conceals over 7 useful tools like a wrench set, hammer head, ruler, and fire starter.

Keep your treasured cards and gaming paraphernalia safe and organized by storing them inside these spellbook gaming boxes. While the exterior resembles an antique spellbook, the inside is specially designed to accommodate everything from dice to cards.

Give your smartphone wings and watch it literally take flight using this smartphone piloted autonomous drone. Compatible with both Android and iOS platforms, it allows you to use your phone as an autonomous aerial camera cloud-connected vehicle.

With the smart microhabitat you can grow anything from a herb, vegetable or flower garden and even create a rainforest like environment for pets. This app-controlled habitat automatically regulates everything from temperature to humidity to lighting and ventilation!

Enjoy the sport of fishing virtually anywhere you travel by bringing along this compact fishing rod. Dubbed the Swiss Army knife of fishing rods, it’s made to be salt water resistant and features modular parts that can be interchanged to fit your style of fishing.

No post workout would be complete without downing a fortified six pack of protein infused beer, brah! Each drink comes packed with seven grams of whey protein – so you can meet your daily protein needs and keep getting dem gainz.

Lightbox is a kinetic, wireless light switch made from a solid chunk of real wood that controls many lamps in a room just by picking it up and turning it on its side. With one simple, elegant motion it will control as many lamps in a room as you like.

The mini museum is a portable collection of billions of years of life, science and history in the palm of your hand! Every mini museum features authentic, iconic and labeled rare specimens from earth and space – such as mammoth meat and raw emerald.

Take the guess work out of D&D gaming by playing with these self rolling sound activated gaming dice. These high-tech dice light up internally and can be programmed to automatically roll at the clap of your hands or snap of your fingers.

Ensure you’re ready for anything the day throws your way by packing all your gear inside the ultimate everyday carry bag. It features ample storage for all your essentials and is designed to be used as a stylish and splashproof backpack or duffle bag.

Convert your body heat into light using this battery free eternal flashlight. Simply place your finger over its thermoelectric generator to produce an electric current that will provide the same amount of shine as a traditional flashlight.

Stop living in the stone age and switch over to the laser razor to get the closest shave of your life. This revolutionary razor forgoes the traditional steel blade in favor of a high-tech laser that provides an incredibly close shave with no irritation.

Create incredible works of art even if you aren’t a great artist by coloring in your masterpieces with these Chameleon color changing pens. The revolutionary design of these refillable pens makes it possible to seamlessly blend colors and shade like a professional.

Become part of the e-bike community without breaking the bank by hopping on one of these affordable electric bikes. These eco-friendly rides come in vibrant colors and feature a powerful 350 watt motor with a top speed of 20 miles per hour and a 50 mile range.

Shoot through the water faster than Aquaman with help from the underwater jetpack. They strap around your wrists and propel you through the water so you can explore deeper and further than you normally could while snorkeling or scuba diving.

Explore Neptune’s kingdom like you never thought possible using the underwater exploration drone. This ultra compact drone can be flown through the water at quick speeds and features a neutrally buoyant tether that transmits the video feed from the ROV to you.

Gain a deeper understanding into the field of robotics by building your very own drone using this programmable arachnid robot. Each kit comes with detailed instructions that walk you through every step necessary to construct a mechanical spider.

Increase productivity at work by multitasking with help from this high precision desktop robotic arm. This modern marvel sits atop your desk and can be used by virtually anyone to text, draw, write, or even move things around for you.

Amplify the intensity of your weekly scrimmages using this Bluetooth speaker football. This throwable football comes embedded with a Bluetooth speaker that’s waterproof and designed to stand up to high impact collisions so it can keep playing music.

Discreetly carry your smartphone like a private investigator/undercover detective would his firearm using this masculine smartphone holster. It comfortably wraps around your torso so that your phone remains protected while leaving your pockets clutter free.

Kickstart a promising career in <del>crystal meth production</del> the world of science by purchasing the ultimate chemistry set. This treasure trove of chemistry goodies comes with glassware, chemicals, and even an informative book filled with cool experiments.

Increase your mobility around town or while you travel by bringing along the compact folding bicycle. Although the bike features large wheels, the sturdy and lightweight titanium frame folds up into a package small enough to comfortably fit inside your trunk.

Upgrade your vehicle into a state of the art smart car by outfitting it with this transparent heads up display. The sleek functional design lets you view maps, listen to music, and answer calls without taking your eyes off the road ahead.

Declare war on your neighbor’s workstation by sending a barrage of small coins their way using the penny launching trebuchet. Once assembled it stands at a mighty 9 inches tall and is capable of launching copper Lincolns up to 35 feet away!

Get more out of your television by transforming it into a giant touchscreen using the Touchjet Wave converter. Using an infrared sensor, it mounts directly to the top of your TV and instantly lets you use either your fingers or a stylus pen to navigate your favorite apps.

Set up  a cozy lounge area in the middle of the great outdoors in a breeze using this triple hammock frame. After you’ve found a few sturdy trees to latch onto, simply place your hammocks at your desired height levels to create the ultimate hangout spot.

Turn your smartphone into a futuristic high tech toy by constructing your very own 3D hologram device. By following a few simple instructions you’ll be able to piece together a clear pyramid-like structure that you can utilize to create small holograms with your phone.

The Buddy collar is like the FitBit for dogs – it keeps your canine safe while tracking and organizing his daily activity. This LED dog collar keeps your pet visible at night while the real time GPS and Bluetooth technology let you know where he’s at with a tap of a button.

Upgrade any garment into a handy multi-tool by attaching this titanium zipper pull onto it. Its compact size lets you easily carry it on your clothes or on your keychain while the functional design lets you use it for everything from opening a can to lifting a pulltab.

Transform your smartphone into your very own studio on the go using this selfie stick microphone. With its easy to grip mic, it holds your phone at the ideal angle to record yourself, so you can transmit loud and clear to your legion of faithful followers.

Match your timepiece to any look by accessorizing using this interchangeable watch. Using strategically placed magnets, an O-ring, and quick change clips, you’ll easily be able to swap and customize everything from the type of band to the watch face.

Create the ideal environment for your futuristic RPG games by playing them using this sci-fi dice. The dice feature a cool TRON-like design that glows in one of three vibrant shades – such as neon blue or green – and comes in one of three stunning finishes.

Increase your productivity by cutting down on travel time using this electric folding bicycle. It is the world’s lightest and most compact electric bike ever built, transforming in seconds for maximum convenience with a range of fifteen miles.

Preserve your most valued data for generations to come by keeping it on these laser etched indestructible data storage disks. While most forms of storage have a 30 year lifespan at best, these nanoform disks are designed to last for thousands of years.

Turn the party into a mobile event when show up with the portable beer keg. Simply mount this fully portable kegerator onto anything with wheels and it becomes the ultimate means of keeping your freshly tapped brew cold and pressurized.

Build your own lightsaber like every Jedi must when you get your hands on this modular lightsaber hilt. Regardless of whether you’re a seasoned warrior or a young Padawan, the hilt provides you with the foundation to build the ultimate combat weapon.

Keep your luscious lips feeling great without loosing any man points by moistening up with this lip balm for men. It’s made from all natural ingredients to soothe chapped lips and comes in an all black casing so no one confuses it with some prissy chap stick.

Take all the hard work out of bartending by automating the drink concocting process with the capsule cocktail machine. Simply insert the capsule of your choice and select the liquor strength, and this handy appliance will whip up the perfect cocktail in seconds.

Become a real life Wolverine by strapping on a pair of these muscle sensing retractable bionic claws. The sensors utilize technology that measures muscle activity to produce the voltage necessary to make the claws extend and retract on command.

Perform small tasks like opening boxes and popping off a bottle cap with tremendous ease using the every day carry multi-tool key. It incorporates a handy stainless steel knife and bottle opener into a compact design that fits on your keychain.

Keep all your ice cold refreshments visible while you relax by the pool by storing them inside the transparent cooler. The eye-catching see-through design provides a 360 degree view of its contents so you can quickly take inventory and grab what you want.

Don’t let your scatterbrain tendencies stop you from having a home full of lush greenery – because now you can keep your plants automatically watered. The ingenious design hydrates plants and herbs in an electricity free wet-dry cycle – just like nature intended.

Ensure you stay adequately hydrated – and buzzed – during your next outing by wearing the hoodie flask. Two hidden flasks in the hood allow you to transport up to 20 ounces of your favorite booze that you can sip discreetly through the clever pull string straws.

Enjoy the benefits of owning a PC without breaking the bank with the world’s first nine dollar computer. It’s small enough to fit in your hand yet powerful enough to allow you to surf the web, check your e-mail, and edit spreadsheets, and much more.

Take the fashion world by storm with these denim sunglasses. This unique pair of shades employs a revolutionary technique that infuses layers of denim fabric with a specialized resin that results in a contoured frame made entirely out of denim.

Travel to a galaxy far, far away without ever leaving your bedroom by getting lost in one of these Star Wars 3D paper scenes. Each kirigami masterpiece depicts a scene inspired from the characters and story line of the legendary sci-fi film series.

Get the latest technology without having to replace your phone every 6 months by customizing it using the modular smartphone case. It allows you to modify nearly any feature imaginable – from add-on memory to an amplified speaker to a larger battery capacity.

Combine your love of paleontology and aviation into one killer package by taking to the skies with the flying radio controlled pterodactyl. It features a distinct dinosaur themed frame and comes with a 1600 foot range to provide a unique R/C flying experience.

Perform every chore at the campsite without having to bring along your entire tool shed by carrying this multi-tool shovel instead. The innovative design conceals over ten useful tools ranging from a hammer to a fire starter and a flashlight.

Cruise into the future of skating with style by equipping your board with these suspension skateboard trucks. Apart from providing a smoother ride, the revolutionary design also allows for higher speeds in addition to greater handling and overall increased performance.

Construct the ultimate paper projectile firearm when you get your hands on the DIY cardboard assault rifle. The 124 piece kit comes with everything you need to build an eye catching blaster that shoots soft splat paper ammo up to 65 feet.

Enjoy the savory taste of smoked meats anywhere you go by using the fold up BBQ grill. This revolutionary grill is lightweight and designed to compactly fold up and fit into your backpack – making it perfect for campouts and tailgate parties.

Avoid accidentally dropping your tools as you toil away by wearing the magnetic tool vest. This functional garment is made from durable polyester and features a combination of pockets and flexible magnetic plates designed to keep your tools stuck on you.

Become the hero your city deserves by suiting up in this fully functional combat ready Batman suit. Using lightweight and flexible materials – such as impact-absorbing foam, Kevlar, and 1/4″ Kydex plating – the suit is designed for real world crime fighting.

Take the hard work out of skating as you roll down the street in style riding the in wheel motorized skateboard. Unlike other electric boards, this one features independent motors inside each wheel – making it the most intuitive and easy to use skateboard around.

Charge your electronic devices without having to use a wall outlet by generating your own electricity using the world’s smallest hydropower plant. This compact device utilizes the power of flowing water to create energy for you to charge your various gadgets.

Help make our planet a greener place, one cup of Joe at a time by enjoying your caffeinated beverage from the plantable coffee cup. Each cup carries native seeds embedded within so you can plant it and watch it grow after you’re finished drinking from it.

Organize and store your keys in one of the most time tested tools known to man with the carabiner keychain. The practical design offers convenient storage for your keys while also incorporating an array of small tools such as a screwdriver, wrench, and bottle opener.

Become part of the legacy of Dunshire by partaking in the thrilling and convoluted experience that is the Cones of Dunshire board game. Thanks to the Architect – and Mayfair games – you and up to 11 friends can have old fashioned Pawnee styled fun.

Take on any cocktail order that comes your way like a pro with the multi-function bar tool by your side. The functional design makes use of every inch by incorporating ten tools into a compact unit so you can do everything from squeezing limes to opening bottles.

Commemorate the greatness of the Pacific Northwest by celebrating the two things it does best – beer and natural beauty – with the Mount Hood beer glass. This unique glass allows you to enjoy your favorite regional brew while taking in a majestic mountain view.

Keep gadgets fully charged while on top secret missions by bringing along the military grade portable charger. No matter where you venture to, this battle tested and completely waterproof charger can withstand anything you throw in its path.

Take your on-stage antics to rock star levels the next time you play using the wireless guitar cable. For the first time, you’ll be able to plug directly into your ax and wirelessly stream and connect to speakers, tablets, or phones while providing premium sound quality.

Get drunk Jetson’s style as you pound drink after delicious drink made by the robotic cocktail bartender. With the push of a button on your smartphone, you’ll be able to order up and enjoy a professionally made cocktail right in the comfort of home.

Prepare to leave your competition in the dust by training for the upcoming race using the runner’s bicycle. The innovative design – made specifically for runners – provides a high intensity yet low impact workout that helps you avoid injury.

Capture and share moments like never before with the auto following nano camera drone. This ultra-portable aerial camera is small enough to fit in the palm of your hand and intelligent enough to fly all by itself via an onboard WiFi connected to your smartphone!

Saint Nick may not be paying you a visit this year but fear not for Krampus has your back. He’ll reward your naughty ways by allowing you to get inebriated using this distinguished beer stein masterfully carved and painted with a rendition of his iconic image.

Breathe some life into your backyard by turning it into a haven for butterflies with the monarch butterfly habitat kit. The kit comes with everything you’ll need to plant milkweed – the only plant that supports monarch butterflies – and help out a struggling species.

Enjoy watching the rain fall over you while remaining perfectly dry with the air shield umbrella. The innovative design deploys rapid bursts of pressurized air in order to create an invisible umbrella effect that shields you from the downpouring rain.

Extend a friendly hello to your fellow drivers as you clean your window using the waving hand rear window wiper. This novelty hand outline securely fastens to your car’s rear wiper to create a waving hand gesture once it has been activated.

Get your self-lacing Nikes ready, because its time to shred up the streets on your very own real hover board! After decades of waiting, the hoverboards seen in Back To The Future will now be available for your personal enjoyment. This is heavy, Doc.

Change outfits in public without exposing your birthday suit to everyone around with help from the revolutionary portable changing room dress. The dress’s unique design allows you to discretely and easily change clothes while remaining completely covered.

Let your loved ones selfies brighten up your day with the illuminating Instagram photo cube. This high tech cube allows you to display up to five of your favorite printed pictures on a customized cube that lights up from within to enhance their color and brilliance.

Turn your home into an impenetrable fortress by upgrading to the smart door lock. This reinvented smartphone connected lock is crafted from steel, glass reinforced nylon and aluminum to keep out any and all intruders using an anchored deadbolt-like system.

Overweight bags will become a thing of the past when you start travelling with the built in weight scale suitcase. Designed for the 21st century traveler, this high tech suitcase displays the total weight on the exterior so you can avoid paying overweight fees.

Terrify the other inhabitants of your fish tank with the addition of the mechanical desktop great white shark. While this pint sized predator looks every bit as fearsome as his real counterpart, he comes in peace – in fact, he requires absolutely no food at all!

Feel like the master of the universe as you use the ultrasonic levitation machine to defy the laws of physics and make objects float in thin air. The ground-breaking technology utilizes sound waves to levitate objects like insects or even your future hoverboard.

Look fresh to <del>death</del> extinction when you show up to the museum of natural history rocking the Triceratops sneakers. Proving that the fashion life of sneakers, uh… finds a way – it comes with green skin and three pointy horns to mimic this iconic dinosaur.

Turn your favorite photographs into brilliant build-able mosaics with help from the LEGO brick art software. With this easy to use software, you’ll be able to convert almost any image, logo, or dick pic into a LEGO brick mosaic that you construct yourself!

You may not be able to cleanse the STDs off your own pair – but at least your beer pong balls can be as pristine as the day you bought them with this portable washing device. You’ll never have to settle for guzzling down disgusting warm beer again!

Bring your outfit to life by accessorizing it with glow in the dark jewelry. These eye-catching pieces are available in everything from pendants to earrings and glow in beautiful neon hues that’ll make you shine like the vibrant attention queen that you are.

Increase your chances of survival in the unforgiving wilderness by wearing the survival wrist watch. More rugged than Rambo and Bear Grylls combined, this watch stands up to all weather conditions and features a multitude of useful tools.

Turn a simple picnic into a movable feast by packing everything you need in the portable collapsible solar powered refrigerator. Unlike coolers, this pint-size fridge offers insulation and the cooling power of a real refrigerator that you can take just about anywhere!

Talk to the hand – literally – with the giant hand phone handset. Rather than using a standard phone like all those normal people who logically care about their appearance do, you get to have lively conversations while you talk into a comically large hand!

Cure your boredom by getting lost in the hypnotizing back and forth motion of the never ending slinky machine. The machine allows you to set the slinky on the surface and trap it in an endless loop  – as if you were sending it down a never ending staircase.

Settle the age old argument of who can get alcohol poisoning the fastest with help from the beer chugging flowmeter. The flowmeter provides the raw alcohol consumption data you’ve always wanted to know, like chug time, volume, and beers per minute (BPM).

Pizza and sleep, what could be better? Absolutely nothing! Ergo nothing is better that the pizza bed. This scrumptious looking bedspread transforms your bed into a huge grease-soaked pepperoni pizza with a sauce colored interior and comfortable crust pillows.

Re-write history by breaking the record for longest top spin when you whip out this high performance spinner top. This isn’t your Grandpa’s dreidel – this ruby tipped masterpiece has been hand-crafted so it will spin flawlessly for extended periods of time.

Invest in the future of this doomed planet by contributing to the solar panel roadways project. These roadways of the future can reduce greenhouse gases by 75%, help melt snow, and most importantly will drastically reduce our dependence on oil.

Dump those flimsy cards and upgrade to a deck that’s stronger than steel with the carbon fiber playing cards. No matter how many poker nights you put them through, these 100% carbon fiber cards will maintain their form and won’t bend like regular paper cards.

Stay connected at all times while traveling the world with the electronics charging backpack. Apart from storing all your gadgets, the backpack features an all purpose plug you can use to charge every single last one of your electronic devices, and then some!

Help save this godforsaken planet before it’s too late by investing in the ocean current power generator. It harnesses the ocean’s limitless currents in order to produce clean energy and hopefully reduce our dependency on fossil fuels and nuclear energy.

Channel the power of retro gamer technology to create some amazing dishes in the kitchen with the Nintendo Power Glove oven mitt. Styled like the old school Nintendo power glove, they’ll keep your hands injury free so you can continue gaming after baking.

Nothing works better to prevent searing burns while on those rainy coffee runs than the umbrella drinks holder. This convenient device attaches to the umbrella handle and safely holds up to two cups of coffee so your other hand remains free.

Help your dog build the habit of putting his toys away after he is done playing with them with this doggy treat dispensing toy bin. This clever device dispenses a delicious and rewarding treat for your dog when he successfully puts away a toy in the bin.

Get organized at the job site – this revolutionary screw grabber is a transparent rubber sleeve that slides onto screwdrivers to hold a variety of non-magnetic screw sizes to the end of your tool. You will never drop a screw again!

Plant like a true gun-loving ‘Murican by firing off a few rounds of shotgun shell flower seeds. These innovative shells take the boring hard work out of farming and gardening – and replace it with the thrill of taking aim, pulling the trigger, and planting!

Make your iPhone come to life by giving it the gift of light with the illuminous pattern iPhone case. It’s the innovative case that utilizes the light used in the flash to bend light through the case in order to make the pattern glow bright white.

With the smartphone controlled bed fan in your room, you’ll sleep in total comfort even the coldest or muggiest of nights. When the weather isn’t cooperating, the bed fan swoops in to save the day by allowing you to warm up or cool down your bed for total comfort.

Showcase a variety of 8-bit works of art  with the animated pixel art frame. This unique frame can be loaded up with hundreds of your favorite 8-bit video game characters and symbols – displaying them onto an LED lit screen for the world to see.

Act out your most action packed fantasies without risking serious injury by fighting with the interactive light up foam swords. These soft foam swords light up from within and feature an interactive health meter on the handle for keeping score of your epic duel.

Kiss laundry day goodbye when you slip into a pair of stainproof pants – the last pair of pants you will ever wear. They’re the pants of the future – water resistant, stain resistant, and all around more durable than jeans so you can go on living without worrying about dirty pants.

Elevate your ultimate frisbee game with the almost indestructible carbon fiber frisbee. This sleek and aerodynamic frisbee glides through the air with ease and features an incredibly strong carbon fiber body that will hold up to just about anything.

The magnic light is the first ever contactless dynamo-powered bike light system that works without any components attached to the wheels. A tiny magnetic light unit will generate never-ending bright light without any batteries, wheel-contact, or noticeable resistance.

Play a futuristic game of pool when you transform your table with the chrome billiard balls. These chrome balls meet all the specifications for regulation billiard balls and offer a shiny chrome finish that bring a new level of style and elegance to the game.

Say goodbye to laundry chores after you begin sporting the self cleaning shirt on a daily basis. This high tech shirt features specialized hyrophobic nanotechnology that prevents stains from sweat and drinks – now if only you could do something about the intolerable B.O.

Increase your chances of survival when biking through the concrete jungle with the turn signal backpack. This compact backpack serves the dual function of providing a spacious storage space for personal belongings and warning oncoming traffic about your trajectory.

Mother earth will be thanking you profusely when you begin sharing data with others using the biodegradable thumb drives. These thumb drives come in sets of four and can each be detached from the cardboard frame whenever you need to share information on the go.

Transform your horsey into a captivating creature of intrigue with the horse tail LED lights. The lights attach to the horse’s tail and shine bright in a cascade of colors that create an eye catching effect whether the horse is standing still or galloping at full speed.

Harness mother nature’s power to your advantage with the portable hydroelectric powerplant. This high-tech gadget comes in handy for situations where traditional power isn’t available – such as camping outdoors – and features a USB port for added convenience.

Make gambling more interesting with the ammo box poker set. This customized set comes in a kick-ass .30 caliber ammo box and includes everything you need for your gambling needs – from a custom dealer button to a pair of army green and navy blue decks.

Create a rift through space and time with the Doctor Who GuiTARDIS. No matter at what point in time and space you find yourself, this TARDIS shaped guitar – aptly named the guiTARDIS –  will help you deliver a face-melting solo every time.

Light up the stage with something other than your skills by playing with the the light up guitar pick. The eye catching picks light up with insanely bright colors allowing you to thrill and awe your audience with something other than your insane shredding.

Avoid some gnarly wipe outs by riding with the longboard skateboard brakes. A foot pedal mounted at the front activates a powerful braking system designed to give the rider more control during potentially dangerous downhill runs.

The radio control flying car hybrid breaks all the boundaries of conventional r/c cars as they dominate both land and air. The flying car features a sleek polycarbonate body in addition to custom made wheels that become propellers so that you can rule the sky.

Keep your valuables safe and dry at all times by wearing the waterproof pocket shorts. Each stylish pair includes a specialized pocket designed to keep all electronics and valuables completely dry. Great for forgetful people who typically run straight into the water.

Enhance your gaming experience with the realistic FPS game controller. With its realistic form, this controller will revolutionize the way you play your favorite first person shooter games, and will surely give more ammo for anti-gaming lawmakers.

Get some quality nap time in wherever you are with the shoulder rest pillow. Simply place the pillow device on your shoulder, start counting sheep backwards, and enjoy a divine nap session – and when you wake up you’ll feel refreshed with just a slightly stiff neck!

Pedal your way into the future of biking with the light up bike handle bars. Built for comfort and performance, these custom handle bars come equipped with GPS, bluetooth, proximity lighting in addition to several other features designed to optimize your ride.

Whether you’re looking to break into a home or simply hang a painting on the wall of said home, the crowbar hammer is the only tool you’ll need. Its ergonomic design includes two sturdy metal pieces that double as a crowbar or hammer when interlocked.

Yaarrr! Now you can rustle up a delicious breakfast of sinister but delicious flapjacks using the skull and crossbones pancake mold. The cast iron mold works well for cooking a variety of different foods while branding every item with the feared pirate flag logo.

Skating and BMX are old news, the new extreme comes with three wheels in the form of the stunt tricycle. Unlike your dinky trike from preschool, the stunt tricycle features custom swiveling back wheels that enable 180s, 360s and a mess of other extreme tricks.

Stand out from the rest of the paper-card-carrying drones in the corporate world by handing out wooden business cards instead. These all-natural business cards display your information in a beautiful wood medium guaranteed to make a lasting impression.

Wrap your gifts in these ultra realistic cheeseburger wrapping papers and watch as your gift recipients start to water at the mouth. Featuring bun, meat patty, cheese, lettuce, and tomato wrapping paper, this unique set will make your gifts stand out even more.
